subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The pulse still beats for Boston’s Big Three, with more vigor than anyone realized, as Paul Pierce scored a decisive 3-pointer to give the Celtics a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference Finals.
